subject: waves,
author: SnowfireL@aol.com
full_text:
--part1_3e56d.821384a.39691989_boundary
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Does any one know anything about long wave lengths? And  wide band widths?  
Is FM a long wave?  My RS do not get signal on the  AM where I am, and 
there are limited stations here, actually only one or two  radio stations, and 
they are anywhere from 50 to 60 miles away for the  closest very few 
stations.  For the heck of it I asked if they need the  long wave, i got a "yes" out 
of a guy, wish I knew how to make these things.  sf

--part1_3e56d.821384a.39691989_boundary
